mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `LR_LRC_IP_WHITE` ( `lrcIpWhiteId` INTEGER (16) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `lrcIpWhiteKey` VARCHAR (64), `lrcKey` VARCHAR (64), `ipAddress` VARCHAR (64), PRIMARY KEY (`lrcIpWhiteId`));
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `LR_LRC_IP_WHITE` ( lrcIpWhiteId, lrcIpWhiteKey, lrcKey, ipAddress ) VALUES ( #{lrcIpWhiteId}, #{lrcIpWhiteKey}, #{lrcKey}, #{ipAddress} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE `LR_LRC_IP_WHITE` SET
lrcIpWhiteKey = #{lrcIpWhiteKey},
lrcKey = #{lrcKey},
ipAddress = #{ipAddress},
WHERE lrcIpWhiteKey = #{lrcIpWhiteKey}
